institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 9 (Obligation to Maintain Confidentiality and Compliance with Ethics)
contents: Article 9 (Obligation to maintain confidentiality and comply with ethics) ① Deliberation committee members and reviewers shall not disclose or disclose any confidential matters such as customer information, examination results, etc. learned during deliberations related to the consortium business, or for purposes other than work. cannot be used in Revised March 26, 2019, ② In order to maintain confidentiality and comply with ethics in accordance with the provisions of Paragraph 1, the Chairman of the Board must submit Form No. 3 of the Standard Rules for Committee Operations when appointing an external member and Form No. The form “Integrity Pledge” must be requested every time. Revised 2023. 4. 25.
